name: globeflower
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of several plants from the buttercup family, with round yellow, white, or orange flowers: Globeflowers like their roots in cool moist soil and their heads in some sun. The globeflower is a cool, clear yellow, and will add colour to a dark corner.
More examplesFewer examplesThese limestone areas have a high number of rare plants, including the spreading globeflower.If you want to grow globeflowers from seed, the secret is to find a well-grown cultivar.The globeflower is on both the federal and state endangered lists.
